extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
abandoned farm_21.name: Abandoned farm

apron_143.desc: The apron is small and a picture of a fire is painted on its front.
apron_143.name: apron

armory_163.desc: The armory is vast and served to hold the guard's weapons. spears, shields, swords alike were put in the steel plated armory.
armory_163.name: armory

assassin_112.desc: This assassin holds no value for any life other than his own and will stop at nothing to achieve his goals.
assassin_112.name: assassin
assassin_112.persona: Killing for a living puts things in perspective. It makes me appreciate life more. I would gladly annihilate all living beings for an appropriate fee.

assistant chef_96.desc: He is the bumbling but charming assistant to the chef, who has aspirations to become the head chef one day.
assistant chef_96.name: assistant chef
assistant chef_96.persona: I cook for the King and Queen and other Royals in the area. I take the directions from the head chef. I hope to someday be the head chef.

bat king_61.desc: The leader of the flock that the individual surrounds itself with, also is fearless.
bat king_61.name: bat king
bat king_61.persona: I am a bat king. I command all bats and they do my bidding. I live in the highest part of the cave and defeat all that challenge me. I eat fruit and smaller bats.

bathroom pot_57.desc: The notorious pot holds a stale liquid.
bathroom pot_57.name: bathroom pot

battle master_75.desc: Most generals would oversee his during a battle but this one fights along side his men. You by his scratched and dinged up heavy plate mail armor. You can also tell by the men admire him while he is riding his gigantic battle steed across the battlefield with thundering hoof beats. You can tell by the fire in his eyes he does not do it for personal just to protect as many men under his leadership as he can.
battle master_75.name: battle master
battle master_75.persona: I am the general's battle master. I oversee the troops during battles. I am the general's right hand man.

beach house_49.desc: The beach house sits right on the sand.  it's color give beauty to the house as a whole.
beach house_49.name: beach house

bedding_72.desc: The bedding is soft and warm, and is made out of silk and stuffed with animal feathers.
bedding_72.name: bedding

bell_41.desc: The bell is small and old, with a thin layer of tarnish that covers the silver. there's a small crack running down from the top.
bell_41.name: bell

big robes_104.desc: the robe is made with various materials
big robes_104.name: big robes

big table_103.desc: The table is large enough for 50 people.
big table_103.name: big table

big wooden table_106.desc: The table is large, with rough boards and a few knot holes in the wood.
big wooden table_106.name: big wooden table

bighorn sheep_86.desc: The alpha ram dominates over all the other sheep in the flock. They step aside to allow him to be first at the food and water. Even humans coming running at the slightest bleating from his lips.
bighorn sheep_86.name: bighorn sheep
bighorn sheep_86.persona: I am a sheep with the biggest horns in the area. Other sheep give me food and drink. I know how to get humans to check on me.

blacksmith's hammer_113.desc: The hammer is made of sturdy iron, but is covered in a layer of rust.
blacksmith's hammer_113.name: blacksmith's hammer

blanket_125.desc: The blanket is made from thick cotton, and it is a dull red color.
blanket_125.name: blanket

boar_128.desc: The ugly boar does not like people or other animals that try to kill him for food!
boar_128.name: boar
boar_128.persona: I am an ugly animal. I am eaten sometimes for food. I do not like those who try to hunt me.

bookcase_109.desc: The bookcase is large and made of sturdy wood.
bookcase_109.name: bookcase

bow and arrows_135.desc: A bow an arrow. made from fine materials. mostly used for hunting and protection.
bow and arrows_135.name: bow and arrows

broken glass_36.desc: The glass is shattered in a hundred pieces, it is sharp and dangerous.
broken glass_36.name: broken glass

bucket for eliminating waste_89.desc: The bucket is filled with a noxious brown liquid.
bucket for eliminating waste_89.name: bucket for eliminating waste

bucket_158.desc: The rusty bucket has a few dents.  the handle is broken.
bucket_158.name: bucket

buckets full of ice_90.desc: The bucket is wet and surrounded by condensation from the ice inside
buckets full of ice_90.name: buckets full of ice

butler_43.desc: The butler, quiet as a mouse, cleaned the room as his master slept.
butler_43.name: butler
butler_43.persona: I serve my masters quietly. I know all the secrets of the elite but will never tell a soul. I have lived in this home since I was 12.

candle_52.desc: The candle smells of enchanting vanilla and wax drips down it's side. It has been used a few times but not overused
candle_52.name: candle

candy_38.desc: The candy is hard and shiny on the outside and made from sweet sugar and honey.
candy_38.name: candy

cannon_78.desc: The cannon is rusty, but still loaded.
cannon_78.name: cannon

cargo_76.desc: The cargo is stacked up neatly.
cargo_76.name: cargo

cast iron and copper pots_105.desc: The pot is old and can only hold food such as chicken clearly.
cast iron and copper pots_105.name: cast iron and copper pots

hand carved 30 person kings dining table.target_id: hand carved 30 person kings dining table_161

castle_34.desc: This castle is made from red brick. The walls are all painted purple and have gold trim. There is a big chandelier that lights up the main room of the castle.
castle_34.extra_desc: The inside of the castle is where all important visitors come when in town. The kings throne is located in the castle and never moved. The inside of the castle gets a new coat of paint every month.
castle_34.name: Castle

extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
central garden_4.name: Central garden

chamber pot_153.desc: The chamber pot smells terrible, like it has only been hastily emptied and not cleaned.
chamber pot_153.name: chamber pot

chapel_141.desc: The chapel is built of large grey stones with colored glass windows in the back.
chapel_141.name: chapel

chimney_51.desc: The chimney is dirty and messy
chimney_51.name: chimney

clothes made of various plant matter suc.desc: The living vines that once hung in the trees now mask the flesh of man.
clothes made of various plant matter suc.name: clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines
names: clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines
clothes made of various plant matter suc.node_id: clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines_111

coconut_129.desc: The coconut is not yet ripe and will make one sick if eaten.
coconut_129.name: coconut

corn_87.desc: The corn is tasty and delicious, it is big and vast.
corn_87.name: corn

countryside_23.desc: The countryside is quite nice, it's not filled with a lot of people but with travelers here and there. Some in small groups some on their own. They are hosting a campfire where everyone has some to sit and is telling stories about their adventures. Someone is showing local children how to wield some weapons. Another is offering lodge, and stable for travelers and their animals.
countryside_23.extra_desc: The countryside outside the bazaar has always been well known for being a place for people to relax. As they travel back and forth they can stop by campfires and share stories. It was first started by their king. A lovely man who wanted everyone to try and get to know each other and help each other. When he died his villagers wanted to continue his acts of kindness by offering help to those who passed by.
countryside_23.name: Countryside

dense fog_81.desc: The fog is dense, thick and hard to see through. the fog covers most of the land.
dense fog_81.name: dense fog

disposal area_16.desc: It is piled high with the bodies of those that did not survive the torture process. The smell is absolutely nauseating and the rats are multiplying faster than the castle can be rid of the corpses.
disposal area_16.extra_desc: This room is used to hold the dead after they succumb from the various torture methods. Bodies, whole and part, are dumped in piles until they can be cremated weekly.
disposal area_16.name: Disposal area

dress_159.desc: The dress has beautiful frills and small jewels embedded on it
dress_159.name: dress

emperor_67.desc: The emperor was not a strong man although he tried to show himself as strong, if anyone crossed him you would be dead in a moments time, the emperor was a good friend to have but was a frightening enemy, anytime he entered the room you knew it because it got colder.
emperor_67.name: emperor
emperor_67.persona: I am the ruler of the land. I am intimidating to others and they are scared of me. I do not let others challenge my authority.

extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
empty storage room_27.name: Empty storage room

entrance to the pine trees_15.desc: Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
entrance to the pine trees_15.extra_desc: The Pine forest is home to many deer and other animals. It is a sanctuary for people escaping the loud city. It is serene and peaceful and many people have found solace here.
entrance to the pine trees_15.name: Entrance to the Pine trees

entrance_60.desc: Everyone comes in through the entrance of building.
entrance_60.name: entrance

expensive carpet_45.desc: A carpet made of the finest silk and with intricate patterns woven in.
expensive carpet_45.name: expensive carpet

fabric_149.desc: the fabric is white and clean.
fabric_149.name: fabric

farm_145.desc: The farm housed the stables and the livestock to feed the peasants.
farm_145.name: farm

fish market_28.desc: The port is filled with many different small shops that sell fishes caught throughout the day. It is incredibly loud and busy with many customers and fisherman walking around and haggling for a good price on the fishes. There are tons of boxes sitting on the floors everywhere filled with ice, fish, and the fishermen's belongings.
fish market_28.extra_desc: The port is right near the ocean and is a place where fisherman come to sell the fishes they caught throughout the early morning. It is a place of business where they sell more than just fish.
fish market_28.name: Fish Market

flower pot_55.desc: The pot is made of clay.
flower pot_55.name: flower pot

fog_83.desc: The fog is heavy and hard to see through.
fog_83.name: fog

fox_131.desc: This fox lives in the forest and steals from wanderers.
fox_131.name: fox
fox_131.persona: I am the fox of the brook in the forest. I live near the castle in the shrubs. I steal from wanderers.

fresh dry house shoes_48.desc: The house shoes are freshly dried before being worn again.
fresh dry house shoes_48.name: fresh dry house shoes

fresh red paint_121.desc: The paint is a bright red color and easy to apply on a surface.
fresh red paint_121.name: fresh red paint

fur carpet_44.desc: The carpet is made of an animal's fur.  the carpet is soft and warm.
fur carpet_44.name: fur carpet

furniture_124.desc: This piece of furniture is one of a kind.
furniture_124.name: furniture

giant club_77.desc: On further inspection of the giant club you notice it was stained with blood from the battle at the castle earlier.
giant club_77.name: giant club

container_node.target_id: hand carved 30 person kings dining table_161

golden goblet_162.desc: The goblet is made of fine gold and is very well made.
golden goblet_162.name: golden goblet

graveyard_63.desc: The graveyard behind the castle is where the the previous kings and queens lay to rest. no common folk are found buried here.
graveyard_63.name: graveyard

gray stone_114.desc: The stone is covered in mold
gray stone_114.name: gray stone

hand carved 30 person kings dining table.desc: A piece of furniture used to set food on while you eat.
hand carved 30 person kings dining table.name: hand carved 30 person kings dining table
names: hand carved 30 person kings dining table
hand carved 30 person kings dining table.node_id: hand carved 30 person kings dining table_161

hand plow_85.desc: The hand plow is used for farming the fresh earth
hand plow_85.name: hand plow

handmade rug_130.desc: The rug is decorated in a intricate striped pattern and is obviously the work of a fine craftsman.
handmade rug_130.name: handmade rug

hard bench_150.desc: The hard bench appears to be crafted from solid oak, with a gold base in the shape of bird feet.
hard bench_150.name: hard bench

hatchet_70.desc: The hatchet is old and worn out.
hatchet_70.name: hatchet

heavy blanket_97.desc: The heavy blanket is incredibly comfortable.
heavy blanket_97.name: heavy blanket

huge cast iron pot_56.desc: The pot is large and black.  A large meal can be cooked in the pot.
huge cast iron pot_56.name: huge cast iron pot

ink jar_136.desc: The ink in the jar swirls darkly, the glass glimmering in the light.
ink jar_136.name: ink jar

ink well_62.desc: The ink well sat in the king's chambers for use in mail.
ink well_62.name: ink well

kettle_155.desc: The kettle has a large dent on one side, and is scratched in a few places.
kettle_155.name: kettle

kettles_156.desc: The kettle is warm with boiling water in it.
kettles_156.name: kettles

key_66.desc: The key is a large black skeleton key, seemingly made of wrought iron.
key_66.name: key

lance_88.desc: The knight's lance has an edge that bears the palpable scars of battle.
lance_88.name: lance

large gate_59.desc: The gate is vast and big, but a bit rusty.
large gate_59.name: large gate

large pile of hay_123.desc: The pile of hay is large and dusty.
large pile of hay_123.name: large pile of hay

linens_74.desc: The linens blew elegantly in the fresh outdoor air.
linens_74.name: linens

long wooden dining table_107.desc: The long wooden dining table is getting old, you can see the discoloring of it.
long wooden dining table_107.name: long wooden dining table

lord_84.desc: The lord is spoiled brat, but he is so well connected and rich you have to put up with his shenanigans
lord_84.name: lord
lord_84.persona: I am a lord. I have a castle and I serve the king. I ride around the countryside hunting with other noblemen. I collect a lot of taxes.

luxurious bedding_73.desc: The bedding is soft and comforting, finely woven from the best wool.
luxurious bedding_73.name: luxurious bedding

main entrance_7.desc: There are religious statues standing outside this temple.  The outside of the temple is fairly plain itself and imposing looking.  The floor is made out of stone with a bridge leading to the entrance.
main entrance_7.extra_desc: This is where all those who worship come through.  They are greeted by the impressive statues standing outside the temple.
main entrance_7.name: Main entrance

main gate_8.desc: the main gate is new and guarded, it is not run down lie many parts of the area. it is meant to intimidate attackers by making them think the area is all new and not worn down.
main gate_8.extra_desc: the gate being new was the idea of leaders, many resources were poured into the area, to the dismay of many members of the area
main gate_8.name: Main Gate

main graveyard_9.desc: This is an ominous place that a thick fog envelops.  There are rows of primitive gravestones and crosses along with some angelic statues for the more wealthy.  You can hear sobs in the distance as a funeral ceremony is underway.
main graveyard_9.extra_desc: Families of lost loved ones come here to grieve and pay their respects before the dead are buried.  Sometimes, in the dead of night, thieves come to rob the dead of their jewels.
main graveyard_9.name: Main graveyard

main hallway_1.desc: This area is decorated with suits of armor, elaborate carpet pieces, and tapestries.  There's large, detailed paintings adorning the walls of past rulers.
main hallway_1.extra_desc: This is an area where a visitor can get a glimpse of the history of those who rule here.  It's meant to stun and impress those who enter.
main hallway_1.name: Main hallway

main house_3.desc: A fairly plain wooden building, the fireplace in the center of the back wall provides warmth during the winter seasons. There are paintings on the wall showing the farmer's forefathers and the previous owners. The floor is adorned with animal pelt rugs, and wood crafted furniture for the farmers to sit in.
main house_3.extra_desc: The main house provides refuge for the farmers after a hard days work, and is where they sleep, eat, and socialize before heading out for another day in the fields.
main house_3.name: Main house

main street_6.desc: main street is bleak and outdated. it wears the atmosphere of the cemetery based on association. it is dark even in sunlight and has a unique odor
main street_6.extra_desc: many members of the town protested the cemetery being so close to the main street, but they were denied, and the atmosphere reflects this
main street_6.name: Main street

marble furniture_37.desc: The marble furniture is used by the king and queen during royal dinners.
marble furniture_37.name: marble furniture

materials_140.desc: The material is lightweight and can be worn in the summer.
materials_140.name: materials

meat_144.desc: As if fresh from the butcher shop, the meat is a vibrant blood red, and would surely make for a great meal once cooked.
meat_144.name: meat

metal bucket_91.desc: The bucket is rusted and old.
metal bucket_91.name: metal bucket

milk man_117.desc: The milk man has lived just outside the town his entire life. His farm is tucked away in the rolling hills just north of the magnificent castle, where cattle roam about and feed on the grass here and there. He comes into town each day with fresh barrels of milk, furnishing everyone from peasants all the way up to lords. He enjoys his job, and has no enemies among the townspeople.
milk man_117.name: milk man
milk man_117.persona: I am a milkman for  the town in the kingdom. I bring fresh milk to town daily . I love working for the people of the town.

milk_118.desc: The milk is curdled with flies floating in it.
milk_118.name: milk

clothes made of various plant matter suc.target_id: clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines_111

modest living area_18.desc: Mud covered walls and a thatched roof cover the earthen, well-swept floor, packed hard from many generations of feet packing it hard. A fire burns brightly in the dim interior and a wood covered window is thrown wide to let the smoke escape. A few modest woven chairs and a fur skin rug are around the hearth, and a beaten copper pot hangs over the fire, simmering. The smell of mutton stew fills the room.
modest living area_18.extra_desc: The family who lives here has lived on the edge of the forest for generations, passed down from father to son, it has been the only home they have ever known in history. It is near the forest, but in a clearing so they have rich soils where they can grow vegetables, and hunt the forest for wild game. In the springtime, mother and her young ones will go out and pick berries and make delicious preserves.
modest living area_18.name: Modest living area

mug of mead_119.desc: The mug of meed looks tempting.
mug of mead_119.name: mug of mead

name placard_54.desc: The placard is made of wood witha clear name on it.
name placard_54.name: name placard

oak tree_146.desc: The oak tree is the center of the field and very beautiful.
oak tree_146.name: oak tree

old prayer books_42.desc: The old prayer book is tattered and worn. it has markings all over it from a previous owner
old prayer books_42.name: old prayer books

opening_127.desc: The opening is grand in scale and decorated by master craftsmen.
opening_127.name: opening

ornate goblet_47.desc: A goblet made of precious stones and gold.
ornate goblet_47.name: ornate goblet

out house_50.desc: The out house is old and storied, signifying much use.
out house_50.name: out house

outside castle_32.desc: The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
outside castle_32.extra_desc: The outside castle was constructed in ancient times before any other building. It's concrete was one of the first ever used, and the stones used on the entrance door date back to the prehistoric age.
outside castle_32.name: Outside Castle

painting_126.desc: There is a large painting depicting the royal family in the main entrance of the castle. it was painted by the most talented artist in the kingdom.
painting_126.name: painting

paper_79.desc: The paper is torn and yellowing around the edges.
paper_79.name: paper

path to the old mine_95.desc: The path to the old mine was not well maintained and steep.
path to the old mine_95.name: path to the old mine

personal quarters_2.desc: An ornate room, paintings of previous rulers and members of the family hang on the walls.  There's high end pieces of furniture in the room along with books, statues, and expensive pieces of jewelry.
personal quarters_2.extra_desc: This is where the inhabitants of the palace come to rest, write, and do other personal activities.  Treasure is also stored here in hidden places only known to members of the royal family.
personal quarters_2.name: Personal quarters

personal rooms_0.desc: There is a comfortable, but not ornate bed against the wall in the center of the room. There is a dresser and a mirror against the opposite wall. There are various paintings hung throughout the room of landscapes and past kings and queens. There is a fireplace on the east wall with a bearskin rug on the floor in front of it, and two chairs to sit in.
personal rooms_0.extra_desc: The personal room is used for guests to stay in while they visit the palace. The king and queen and the royal family stay in a different wing of the palace.
personal rooms_0.name: Personal rooms

personalized tomb_65.desc: The tomb is preserved and well kept.
personalized tomb_65.name: personalized tomb

picnic area_14.desc: In this picnic area, there is a wide clearing with some cut down tree stumps made for people to sit and enjoy their lunch.  There's also a small pond nearby where people can feed fish and watch turtles sunbathe.
picnic area_14.extra_desc: Peasants come here during their lunch break to enjoy the outdoors before having to go back to their manual labor.  It's one of the few areas where they can unwind.
picnic area_14.name: picnic area

pine tree graveyard_13.desc: Once known as a forest of solitude, the entrance to the pine trees is now a bleak and dreary graveyard.  Dead grass and moss fill the ground along with crawling critters that mark fear in the mind among the he who venture here.  Tombstones so old many of the names are no longer eligible.  Dense fog surrounds the area, thick tree tops blotting out the sunlight, and an eerie silence fills the air.  Cold it feels, the air, but the ground is soft and warm.  Sound can not enter, no escape this dwelling.
pine tree graveyard_13.extra_desc: The nearby town tells strangers that this place is peaceful and beautiful, but little do they know it is not.  A terrible price is paid for all visitors who enter this place, no one has ever returned.
pine tree graveyard_13.name: Pine tree graveyard

pink and white outline_147.desc: The outline of the object, pink and white in color, remained on the ground.
pink and white outline_147.name: pink and white outline

placard_116.desc: A sign used to display names of buildings or notices.
placard_116.name: placard

pool_58.desc: The pool is shallow and small.
pool_58.name: pool

prayer book_94.desc: The book contains many prayers. it has many pages and filled with many words on each.
prayer book_94.name: prayer book

prayer books_110.desc: One book can change the world
prayer books_110.name: prayer books

priceless painting_40.desc: The oil painting depicts the king's grandfather in an ermine robe. the painting is bright and lustrous.
priceless painting_40.name: priceless painting

priest_92.desc: This priest loves preaching and isn't afraid to be hard on people.
priest_92.name: priest
priest_92.persona: I am here to help the needy. I am well respected in the town. I can not accept lying.

primitive fishing pole_71.desc: The fishing pole was splintered and worn.
primitive fishing pole_71.name: primitive fishing pole

proprietor_152.desc: A wealthy owner of many businesses, provides customers with a place to sleep, food, and drink in exchange for money.
proprietor_152.name: proprietor
proprietor_152.persona: I own an inn, pub, or other lodging. I earn money by running a place of lodging. I provide people a place to sleep and food and drink.

reception area_12.desc: The building itself is ordinary in appearance and is somewhat foreboding.  It is surrounding by a dense fog and high grass.  Sometimes, one can hear whispers in the wind.
reception area_12.extra_desc: This is a plain building where business matters of the graveyard are conducted.  Peasants and royalty alike come here to make deals to bury their loved ones in the graveyard.
reception area_12.name: Reception area

red brick_160.desc: The brick has crumbled and looked very weathered.
red brick_160.name: red brick

robe_139.desc: The robe is soft and worn.  It is a royal purple color.
robe_139.name: robe

rock_98.desc: The rock is smooth and heavy.
rock_98.name: rock

rotting meat_157.desc: The meat is rotting and it smells badly almost to the point of nausea.
rotting meat_157.name: rotting meat

sail cloth_69.desc: The sail cloth is a nice fabric.
sail cloth_69.name: sail cloth

salt_148.desc: The salt is clean and white, looking more like a crystal than something to eat.
salt_148.name: salt

saokra's blacksmith shop_25.desc: Saokra's Blacksmith Shop is lined with weapons. They are shown through the outside windows, and once you step inside you see everything from bo staffs to canons. Most of the shop is cool for the work that goes on inside. There are dozens of painted maps on the walls and ceiling. There's a bookshelf over to the left side of the shop that holds nothing but rolled up scrolls, and some have fallen to the floor. Armor sets adorn the manikins to the back of the room. There's a vibrant royal blue knight set of armor that causes the back area to light up in a cool glow of blue. The middle of the room has sunlight beaming into it via a skylight that gives the area a warm feeling.
saokra's blacksmith shop_25.extra_desc: Saokra's Shop has been around for years, Saokra herself has always been the owner of it. No one's sure how but it's believed that she was once a God, and possibly still is but instead of living her life in the heavens she chose to live with the people and enjoys her work. One of the reasons for this is that the shop in question seemed to be around for more than a hundred years and with each weapon or armor set she creates you can feel a hum within it. No one's sure why she decided to live the life she does but everyone is grateful to her for having helped keep some of the bad souls away.
saokra's blacksmith shop_25.name: Saokra's Blacksmith Shop

serving boy_39.desc: The young man darts past you, obviously with places to be. He sure seems so young to be moving with such purpose.
serving boy_39.name: serving boy
serving boy_39.persona: I am the son of the butler in the castle. I assist my father in serving the King and Queen. I live in the servant's quarters of the castle along with my mother and 2 sisters.

shop in bazaar_24.desc: This looks like a lean-to tent.  Propped up on three sides by branches and there is a table in the middle.  The proprietor is selling certain jewels that he claims will provide protection.  They are all different colors and he is well versed in what kind of protection they will provide.
shop in bazaar_24.extra_desc: This tent in the bazaar has been a long time coming.  The proprietor has gone all over the kingdom looking for these stones to make a living.  He really doesn't believe in their powers, but a lady who claimed to be a sorceress that he met in the countryside promised him that if he found these stones and sold them to the townspeople, that he would be greatly rewarded.  So he has spent the better part of the year collecting these jewels.
shop in bazaar_24.name: Shop in Bazaar

small decrepit graveyard_64.desc: This graveyard is pretty small and decrepit but it's very well taken care of. no high grass, no trash anywhere around it
small decrepit graveyard_64.name: small decrepit graveyard

small graveyard_10.desc: This is a small grassy area located under a large oak tree.  There are two home made wooden crosses set up along with mounds where the bodies are buried.
small graveyard_10.extra_desc: This is where the residents of the cottage have buried their loved ones.  They wanted them to be close by so they can pay their respects.
small graveyard_10.name: Small graveyard

small hut_11.desc: Very small, inside and out, the small hut is made of straw that has turned dingy from mold and time. Two cutout for windows and a brown cloth door mark the front entrance. Inside, there is only a wooden chair and table upon which sits a small wooden bowl and spoon.
small hut_11.extra_desc: The hut belongs to Jacob, a man who got lost in the jungle and made himself a home to shield and protect him from the elements, animals, and bugs.
small hut_11.name: Small Hut

small village_115.desc: The small village contains residents too poor to live in the royal city
small village_115.name: small village

small wooden table_99.desc: The table is made of the highest quality wood.
small wooden table_99.name: small wooden table

smith_142.desc: The smith is very talented and can make anything you imagine and works hard to keep his family's name alive.
smith_142.name: smith
smith_142.persona: I work with metal.  I smelt silver into jewelry. My father taught me my trade.

extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
stretch of road_5.name: Stretch of road

sword of the guards_134.desc: The sword is sturdy and so heavy that you have trouble lifting it.
sword of the guards_134.name: sword of the guards

sword_132.desc: Sword's blade was sharp and sturdy. holding it, you could tell it is well versed in the art of war, and is no stranger to the taste of blood, bone and steel.
sword_132.name: sword

table area_17.desc: A floor where musicians and other acts perform as well and dancing and other types of entertainment for the patrons of the tavern. Its a nice place suitable for people who want to enjoy an evening. Hearing music, stories and other entertainments.
table area_17.extra_desc: People from the town and the countryside go to have fun, catch up, and to see what has been happening around the town. While they're here they often find some interesting entertainment from whoever happens to be performing in the tavern today.
table area_17.name: table area

the forest_22.desc: The forest has many trees. It has other plants too. There are animals and many livings things. The forest is very much full of life. When you look at it you might only see plants that are green and different shades of brown but there are many other living things in there too.
the forest_22.extra_desc: The forest started out as a small amount of plants and then the plants kept growing and growing until they were vast. After the plants were very grown the animals and all the small livings things decided to make some houses in the plants.
the forest_22.name: The forest

the forsaken castle_35.desc: Old and creepy, the castle has been abandoned for centuries now. It is broken and destroyed.
the forsaken castle_35.extra_desc: The castle use to belong to a kingdom. It was a beautiful and rich kingdom, but the people were murdered by bandits.
the forsaken castle_35.name: The Forsaken Castle

thick wooden mugs_108.desc: the mug is colorful and huge.
thick wooden mugs_108.name: thick wooden mugs

torture equipment_80.desc: The blood on the torture equipment shows recent use.
torture equipment_80.name: torture equipment

town courtroom_31.desc: This is a single large room, with an aisle leading up to where the magistrate sits, which is behind a bench and podium, on either side of the aisle there are wooden pews for spectators. There are a few maps on the walls and a flag of the land, and a statue of a thief having his hands chopped off by lady justice
town courtroom_31.extra_desc: This is where the magistrate hears grievances and wrongdoings of the common folk, they sue each other for wrongful deaths and witchcraft, and criminals are brought before the magistrate to be sentenced
town courtroom_31.name: Town Courtroom

extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
town garden_30.name: Town garden

town official_122.desc: The official follows all the king's rules and makes sure his wishes are followed by all.
town official_122.name: town official
town official_122.persona: I am the town official of a small medieval town.  My job is to carry out the King's wishes.  I try to keep order in the town, but am not liked by many of the towns folk.

town theater_29.desc: This is a quaint theater with plush velvet seats and a beautiful red curtain. It can seat 200 people. It is decorated with mirrors and golden accents. There are posters of past plays in the lobby.
town theater_29.extra_desc: The theater was built for the local troupe. They put on several plays a year. They also hold town meetings there. People will also rent it out for special occasions.
town theater_29.name: Town Theater

town_26.desc: The town is a small, rural area inhabited by the poorer citizens of the empire. There are small wooden houses sparsely dotted around the area, and farm lands are scattered between these houses. Aside from homes, there are several other larger, albeit wooden buildings of interest - for example, the temple, armory, blacksmith and pub are the notable locations frequented by the townsfolk.
town_26.extra_desc: The town was established as a small settlement well outside of the castle walls. The population consists mostly of laborsmen and poorer subsistence farmers that could not afford the houses within the castle limits. Over time, these lower class citizens settled here and built a modest, friendly town that welcomes anyone to come join them.
town_26.name: Town

two home made wooden crosses_138.desc: the cross has nails stuck on it.
two home made wooden crosses_138.name: two home made wooden crosses

unsettling forest area_20.desc: The forest is actually very creepy even during the day. The trees are so tall that they block the sunlight. There is always fog in the forest which makes it very hard to see. There are a lot of mushrooms near the trees and none of them are edible
unsettling forest area_20.extra_desc: It is believed that this forest is alive! People say that trees are moving from one place to another when nobody sees. This way hunters and other people have a hard time finding their way back. This forest never looks the same
unsettling forest area_20.name: unsettling forest area

extra_desc: Sometimes things are just what they seem. There's nothing interesting here.
unused chamber_33.name: Unused chamber

vanity_137.desc: The vanity is made from the finest oak in all the realm. the designs on the sides are of the royal insignia.
vanity_137.name: vanity

variety of drapes_151.desc: The drape is heavy and course but as a covering, you can use it as protection from the cold.
variety of drapes_151.name: variety of drapes

villager_154.desc: Rotund and jolly, rolly, pole-y, a simple minded, pie contented villager.
villager_154.name: villager
villager_154.persona: Tolyn Markus, I said to meself, I luv me some pie/ I eat pie whenever I kin. Git that pie.

wall hanging_133.desc: The wall hanging shows a deep history imbedded in to it.
wall hanging_133.name: wall hanging

wealthy area of town_19.desc: A new section of town, new stone buildings and with fresh paint and clean installations. It looks like an old city of rich bankers and guilds of merchants.
wealthy area of town_19.extra_desc: This city was once a garrison for the King's soldiers but in times of peace has become the commerce hub of the region. You can see some military installations but they are old and unused, relics of an earlier time.installations
wealthy area of town_19.name: Wealthy area of town

wind_82.desc: The wind blows through the air like a knife through butter
wind_82.name: wind

woman_53.desc: tousled hair in your sweaty face does not stop the leacherous men from staring at you. you work hard and try to stay honest.
woman_53.name: woman
woman_53.persona: I am a woman that lives in the kingdom.  I work at the bakery.  Every day, I am sent out to buy wheat from the market.  It is tedious.

wooden bed_100.desc: A simple wooden rectangle with a grid of interwoven ropes to support a mattress.
wooden bed_100.name: wooden bed

wooden cross_93.desc: The wooden cross is faded in color from being worn too much by the priest
wooden cross_93.name: wooden cross

wooden spit_101.desc: The wooden spit shows signs of repeated use.
wooden spit_101.name: wooden spit

wooden table_102.desc: The wooden table is small, but it is well made.
wooden table_102.name: wooden table

worn quilt_46.desc: the quilt is old and worn out.
worn quilt_46.name: worn quilt

objects: clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines_111
hand carved 30 person kings dining table_161
